page.title: 19ST.GERARDINE SCHOOL SPORTS.
page.content: Our Sports Days are held on two different occasions in June,5 to 7 year olds on one day and 8 to 12 year olds on another.The younger children have a family picnic type of day,whilst the older pupils have an orthodox style of sports.Many varied races are on the programme.There is {SPRINT}racing,with distances varied for different age groups.One of the races is the{THREE-LEGGED}race when children run in pairs with their inside legs tied together(with Dad's best tie)Hopefully they run in time with one another.The{SACK}race is entertaining to watch as the children hop,jump and struggle their way to the finishing line.The{BACKWARDS}race is very humorous when the children must run backwards to the finish.During the afternoon icecream is served to the children.
